descriptionHtml:
The Ysgramor Legendary Amulet 

Have Following Effects 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Increases Following Attributes 
Resistance To Magic By 15%
Health Regeneration By 10%
Stamina Regeneration By 10%
Block 15% More With Your Shield
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fortify Following Attributes 
Health by 100
Heavy Armor By 50
Carry Capacity By 25
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Where I Can Buy a Amulet ?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Khajiit Caravans :: Ri\'saad\'s :: Ahkari\'s :: Ma\'dran\'s
Blacksmith Quarters :: Beirand :: Solitude
Gray Pine Goods  :: Falkreath
Market Stand :: Aval Atheron :: Windhelm
Market Stand :: Madesi :: Riften
Dragonsreach :: Farengar:: Whiterun
Unknown Place :: Heljarchen
Arnleif And Sons Trading Company  :: Markarth
Birna\'s Oddments :: Winterhold
Falion\'s House :: Morthal
Rustleif\'s House :: Dawnstar
Alvor and Sigrid\'s House :: Riverwood

Can\'t Find A Amulet Any Where ?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please report all known and unknown issues you encounter while you are using mod .
author: glock9mm
